org.mini2Dx.libgdx.graphics

Class LibgdxSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.libgdx.graphics.LibgdxSprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sprite, TextureRegion

    public class LibgdxSprite
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sprite

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LibgdxSprite()
      Creates an uninitialized sprite.
      LibgdxSprite(Sprite sprite)
      Creates a sprite that is a copy in every way of the specified sprite.
      LibgdxSprite(Texture texture)
      Creates a sprite with width, height, and texture region equal to the size of the texture.
      LibgdxSprite(Texture texture, int srcWidth, int srcHeight)
      Creates a sprite with width, height, and texture region equal to the specified size.
      LibgdxSprite(Texture texture, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight)
      Creates a sprite with width, height, and texture region equal to the specified size.
      LibgdxSprite(TextureRegion region)
      Creates a sprite based on a specific TextureRegion, the new sprite's region is a copy of the parameter region - altering one does not affect the other
      LibgdxSprite(TextureRegion region, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight)
      Creates a sprite with width, height, and texture region equal to the specified size, relative to specified sprite's texture region.

    • Field Detail

      • sprite

        public final com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite

    • Constructor Detail

      • LibgdxSprite

        public LibgdxSprite()
        Creates an uninitialized sprite. The sprite will need a texture region and bounds set before it can be drawn.

      • LibgdxSprite

        public LibgdxSprite(Texture texture)
        Creates a sprite with width, height, and texture region equal to the size of the texture.

      • LibgdxSprite

        public LibgdxSprite(Texture texture,
                    int srcWidth,
                    int srcHeight)
        Creates a sprite with width, height, and texture region equal to the specified size. The texture region's upper left corner will be 0,0.
        Parameters:
        srcWidth - The width of the texture region. May be negative to flip the sprite when drawn.
        srcHeight - The height of the texture region. May be negative to flip the sprite when drawn.

      • LibgdxSprite

        public LibgdxSprite(Texture texture,
                    int srcX,
                    int srcY,
                    int srcWidth,
                    int srcHeight)
        Creates a sprite with width, height, and texture region equal to the specified size.
        Parameters:
        srcX - The x coordinate of the region to draw
        srcY - The y coordinate of the region to draw
        srcWidth - The width of the texture region. May be negative to flip the sprite when drawn.
        srcHeight - The height of the texture region. May be negative to flip the sprite when drawn.

      • LibgdxSprite

        public LibgdxSprite(TextureRegion region)
        Creates a sprite based on a specific TextureRegion, the new sprite's region is a copy of the parameter region - altering one does not affect the other

      • LibgdxSprite

        public LibgdxSprite(TextureRegion region,
                    int srcX,
                    int srcY,
                    int srcWidth,
                    int srcHeight)
        Creates a sprite with width, height, and texture region equal to the specified size, relative to specified sprite's texture region.
        Parameters:
        srcX - The x coordinate of the region to draw
        srcY - The y coordinate of the region to draw
        srcWidth - The width of the texture region. May be negative to flip the sprite when drawn.
        srcHeight - The height of the texture region. May be negative to flip the sprite when drawn.

      • LibgdxSprite

        public LibgdxSprite(Sprite sprite)
        Creates a sprite that is a copy in every way of the specified sprite.

      • set

      • setBounds

        public void setBounds(float x,
                      float y,
                      float width,
                      float height)
        Description copied from interface: Sprite
        Sets the position and size of the sprite when drawn, before scaling and rotation are applied. If origin, rotation, or scale are changed, it is slightly more efficient to set the bounds after those operations.
        Specified by:
        setBounds in interface Sprite

      • setSize

        public void setSize(float width,
                    float height)
        Description copied from interface: Sprite
        Sets the size of the sprite when drawn, before scaling and rotation are applied. If origin, rotation, or scale are changed, it is slightly more efficient to set the size after those operations. If both position and size are to be changed, it is better to use Sprite.setBounds(float, float, float, float).
        Specified by:
        setSize in interface Sprite

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(float x,
                        float y)
        Description copied from interface: Sprite
        Sets the position where the sprite will be drawn. If origin, rotation, or scale are changed, it is slightly more efficient to set the position after those operations. If both position and size are to be changed, it is better to use Sprite.setBounds(float, float, float, float).
        Specified by:
        setPosition in interface Sprite

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(float degrees)
        Description copied from interface: Sprite
        Sets the rotation of the sprite in degrees. Rotation is centered on the origin set in Sprite.setOrigin(float, float)
        Specified by:
        setRotation in interface Sprite

      • rotate

        public void rotate(float degrees)
        Description copied from interface: Sprite
        Sets the sprite's rotation in degrees relative to the current rotation. Rotation is centered on the origin set in Sprite.setOrigin(float, float)
        Specified by:
        rotate in interface Sprite

      • rotate90

        public void rotate90(boolean clockwise)
        Description copied from interface: Sprite
        Rotates this sprite 90 degrees in-place by rotating the texture coordinates. This rotation is unaffected by Sprite.setRotation(float) and Sprite.rotate(float).
        Specified by:
        rotate90 in interface Sprite

      • setScale

        public void setScale(float scaleXY)
        Description copied from interface: Sprite
        Sets the sprite's scale for both X and Y uniformly. The sprite scales out from the origin. This will not affect the values returned by Sprite.getWidth() and Sprite.getHeight()
        Specified by:
        setScale in interface Sprite

      • setScale

        public void setScale(float scaleX,
                     float scaleY)
        Description copied from interface: Sprite
        Sets the sprite's scale for both X and Y. The sprite scales out from the origin. This will not affect the values returned by Sprite.getWidth() and Sprite.getHeight()
        Specified by:
        setScale in interface Sprite

      • scale

        public void scale(float amount)
        Description copied from interface: Sprite
        Sets the sprite's scale relative to the current scale. for example: original scale 2 -> sprite.scale(4) -> final scale 6. The sprite scales out from the origin. This will not affect the values returned by Sprite.getWidth() and Sprite.getHeight()
        Specified by:
        scale in interface Sprite

      • getVertices

        public float[] getVertices()
        Description copied from interface: Sprite

        Specified by:
        getVertices in interface Sprite

      • getBoundingRectangle

        public Rectangle getBoundingRectangle()
        Description copied from interface: Sprite
        Returns the bounding axis aligned Rectangle that bounds this sprite. The rectangles x and y coordinates describe its bottom left corner. If you change the position or size of the sprite, you have to fetch the triangle again for it to be recomputed.
        Specified by:
        getBoundingRectangle in interface Sprite
        Returns:
        the bounding Rectangle

        Specified by:
        setX in interface Sprite

      • scroll

        public void scroll(float xAmount,
                   float yAmount)
        Description copied from interface: TextureRegion
        Offsets the region relative to the current region. Generally the region's size should be the entire size of the texture in the direction(s) it is scrolled.
        Specified by:
        scroll in interface TextureRegion
        Parameters:
        xAmount - The percentage to offset horizontally.
        yAmount - The percentage to offset vertically. This is done in texture space, so up is negative.

      • toPixmap

        public Pixmap toPixmap()
        Description copied from interface: TextureRegion
        Converts this TextureRegion to a Pixmap
        Specified by:
        toPixmap in interface TextureRegion
        Returns:
        A new Pixmap instance containing the pixel data

      • split

        public TextureRegion[][] split(int tileWidth,
                               int tileHeight)
        Description copied from interface: TextureRegion
        Helper function to create tiles out of this TextureRegion starting from the top left corner going to the right and ending at the bottom right corner. Only complete tiles will be returned so if the region's width or height are not a multiple of the tile width and height not all of the region will be used. This will not work on texture regions returned form a TextureAtlas that either have whitespace removed or where flipped before the region is split.
        Specified by:
        split in interface TextureRegion
        Parameters:
        tileWidth - a tile's width in pixels
        tileHeight - a tile's height in pixels
        Returns:
        a 2D array of TextureRegions indexed by [row][column].
